001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.net.URISyntaxException;
005import java.util.EnumMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
008import java.util.Objects;
009import java.util.Optional;
010import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
011import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
012import java.util.function.Supplier;
013
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.EncoderProvider;
015import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputType;
016import io.jstach.rainbowgum.format.StandardEventFormatter;
017
018/**
019 * Encoder registry
020 */
021public sealed interface LogEncoderRegistry extends EncoderProvider {
022
023        /**
024         * Finds an encoder by name.
025         * @param name encoder name.
026         * @return encoder
027         */
028        public Optional<LogEncoder> encoder(String name);
029
030        /**
031         * Registers an encoder by name.
032         * @param name encoder name.
033         * @param encoder loaded encoder
034         */
035        public void register(String name, LogEncoder encoder);
036
037        /**
038         * Registers an encoder by uri scheme.
039         * @param scheme encoder name.
040         * @param encoder loaded encoder
041         */
042        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder);
043
044        /**
045         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
046         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
047         * @return formatter for output type.
048         */
049        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType);
050
051        /**
052         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
053         * @param outputType output type.
054         * @param formatter formatter.
055         */
056        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter);
057
058        /**
059         * Creates encoder registry
060         * @return encoder registry
061         */
062        public static LogEncoderRegistry of() {
063                return new DefaultEncoderRegistry();
064        }
065
066}
067
068final class DefaultEncoderRegistry extends ProviderRegistry<LogEncoder.EncoderProvider, LogEncoder, RuntimeException>
069                implements LogEncoderRegistry {
070
071        private Map<String, LogEncoder> encoders = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
072
073        @Override
074        public Optional<LogEncoder> encoder(String name) {
075                return Optional.ofNullable(encoders.get(name));
076        }
077
078        @Override
079        public void register(String name, LogEncoder encoder) {
080                encoders.put(name, encoder);
081        }
082
083        private static URI normalize(URI uri) {
084                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
085                String path = uri.getPath();
086                try {
087                        if (scheme == null) {
088                                if (path == null) {
089                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
090                                }
091                                if (path.startsWith("./") || path.startsWith("/")) {
092                                        uri = new URI("name://" + path);
093                                }
094                                else {
095                                        uri = new URI(path + ":///");
096                                }
097                        }
098                }
099                catch (URISyntaxException e) {
100                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
101                }
102                return uri;
103        }
104
105        @Override
106        public LogEncoder provide(URI uri, String name, LogProperties properties) {
107                uri = normalize(uri);
108                /*
109                 * TODO file bug with checker as it should have found scheme to be null.
110                 */
111                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
112                if (scheme == null) {
113                        throw new IllegalStateException("bug. uri was not normalized");
114                }
115                if (scheme.equals("name")) {
116                        String _name = uri.getHost();
117                        if (_name == null) {
118                                _name = name;
119                        }
120                        return _encoder(uri, name, _name);
121
122                }
123                var provider = providers.get(scheme);
124                if (provider == null) {
125                        throw new NoSuchElementException("No encoder found. URI=" + uri);
126                }
127                return provider.provide(uri, name, properties);
128        }
129
130        private LogEncoder _encoder(URI uri, String name, String resolvedName) {
131                return encoder(resolvedName).orElseThrow(() -> new NoSuchElementException(
132                                "No encoder found. resolved='" + resolvedName + "', name='" + name + "', uri='" + uri + "'"));
133        }
134
135        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
136
137        private final EnumMap<OutputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder>> formatters = new EnumMap<>(OutputType.class);
138
139        /**
140         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
141         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
142         * @return encoder for output type.
143         */
144        @Override
145        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType) {
146                lock.readLock().lock();
147                try {
148                        var formatter = formatters.get(outputType);
149                        if (formatter == null) {
150                                return LogEncoder.of(StandardEventFormatter.builder().build());
151                        }
152                        return Objects.requireNonNull(formatter.get());
153                }
154                finally {
155                        lock.readLock().unlock();
156                }
157        }
158
159        /**
160         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
161         * @param outputType output type.
162         * @param formatter formatter.
163         */
164        @Override
165        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter) {
166                lock.writeLock().lock();
167                try {
168                        formatters.put(outputType, formatter);
169                }
170                finally {
171                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
172                }
173        }
174
175}
